title: Ham, courgette and goat cheese lasagne
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '6 - 8 medium courgettes, cubed', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped mixed herbs, such as basil, parsley marjoram', '500ml bechamel sauce', '12 fresh or pre-cooked lasagne sheets (about 250g)', '100g ham, finely sliced', '100g fresh goat cheese, crumbled', '100g grated Parmesan cheese']
